sentences.english: The release characteristics and anti-tumor activities of CCNU-TSL in vitro were investigated.
sentences.chinese: 并考察脂质体的体外释药特性和体外抗肿瘤活性。

sentences.english: The release rate of lansoprazole from liposomes was also tested.
sentences.chinese: 采用透析法考察脂质体的释放规律。

sentences.english: High pressure extruding action has disadvantage on the encapsulation efficiency.
sentences.chinese: 高压挤压工艺不利于得到较高包封率的熊果苷脂质体。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To estimate drug penetration through skin using liposome electrokinetic chromatography.
sentences.chinese: 目的采用脂质体电动色谱法对药物透皮吸收进行评估。

sentences.english: Objective To introduce the progress of liposome entrapped cyclodextrin complex delivery systems.
sentences.chinese: 目的介绍环糊精包合物脂质体给药系统的研究进展。

sentences.english: Amphotericin B liposome and itraconazole are effective in treating penicilliosis marneffei.
sentences.chinese: 两性霉素B脂质体及伊曲康唑治疗有效。

sentences.english: Objective To prepare plasmid DNA-containing liposomes using detergent removal method and investigate the properties of liposomes.
sentences.chinese: 目的用去污剂透析法制备载基因脂质体并考察其性质。

sentences.english: Objective To determine the encapsulation efficiency and the release rate of baicalin liposome.
sentences.chinese: 目的测定黄芩苷脂质体的包封率与渗漏率。

sentences.english: Result A few of the compounds increase liposomal stability by adding ingredients to the velum or coating the liposomes.
sentences.chinese: 结果多种化合物不同程度地提高了脂质体的稳定性。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To study the antifungal activity of Itraconazole Liposome in vitro.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究伊曲康唑脂质体体外抗深部真菌作用。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo prepare and determine the content and entrapment efficiency of Hydroquinone liposome.
sentences.chinese: 目的制备氢醌脂质体并测定含量及包封率。

sentences.english: By using globin lipoplast, the authors established latex agglutination test to determine occult blood.
sentences.chinese: 本文应用珠蛋白脂质体建立了胶乳凝集实验测便潜血。

sentences.english: Liposome SOD from cactus is prepared by reverse-phase evaporation.
sentences.chinese: 采用逆相蒸发法制备仙人掌SOD脂质体。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the release rate and pharmacodynamics in vitro of of vincristine sulfate liposomes.
sentences.chinese: 目的考察硫酸长春新碱脂质体的体外释放度及其药效。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To prepare and evaluate a liposome hydrogel acemetacin(ACM) .
sentences.chinese: 目的研制阿西美辛脂质体凝胶剂，并进行评价。

sentences.english: Antibody can be linked to liposome particles by covalent binding.
sentences.chinese: 抗体能通过共价键结合在脂质体颗粒上。

definition: polypeptide, chain of amino acids linked by peptide bonds CO-NH, a component of protein
